original_text: Save only that which the young men have eaten, and the portion of the men which went with me, Aner, Eshcol, and Mamre; let them take their portion.
korean_text: 오직 젊은이들이 먹은 것과 나와 동행한 아넬과 에스골과 마므레의 분깃을 제할지니 그들이 그 분깃을 가질 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Save only that which the young men have eaten
and the portion of the men which went with me
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나와 함께 갔던 사람들의 몫을
